pepc-b/randion.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !                RANDION
00004 !
00005 !   $Revision: 1.5
00006 !
00007 !  Sets up 3D random distribution of particles
00008 ! 
00009 ! ==============================================
00010 
00011 subroutine randion
00012 
00013     use physvars
00014     use treevars
00015     use utils
00016 
00017     implicit none
00018 
00019     integer              :: i, j, face_nr
00020     integer              :: idum, iseed1, iseed2, iseed3, i1, n1,p, k, nsphere, nx, ny
00021     real*8               :: xt, yt, zt, radius, dpx, s
00022     real*8 :: c_status
00023     real, dimension(1:3) :: r_temp
00024 
00025     iseed1 = -11 - me      ! Select seed depending on PE
00026     iseed2 = -1001 - me      ! Select seed depending on PE
00027     iseed3 = -2111 - me      ! Select seed depending on PE
00028     if (debug_level>1) write (ipefile, '(a,3i8)') 'Seeds: ', iseed1, iseed2, iseed3
00029     
00030     !  Initialise particles according to target geometry
00031     !       0 = random slab
00032     !       1 = random sphere
00033     !       2 = random disc
00034     !       3 = random wire
00035     !       4 = ellipsoid
00036     !       5 = wedge
00037     !       6 = hemisphere
00038     !       7 = hollow sphere
00039     !       8 = hollow hemisphere
00040 
00041     nsphere = npp
00042 
00043     p = 0
00044     do while (p < nsphere)
00045         geometry: select case (target_geometry)
00046         case(0, 5) ! slab or wedge 
00047             xt = .5 * x_plasma * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(1)
00048             yt = .5 * y_plasma * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(2)         
00049             zt = .5 * z_plasma * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(3)
00050  
00051         case(1, 7) ! sphere and hollow sphere
00052             xt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(1)
00053             yt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(2)        
00054             zt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(3)
00055             
00056         case(2) ! disc
00057             xt = .5 * x_plasma * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(1)
00058             yt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(2)         
00059             zt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(3)
00060             
00061         case(3) ! wire
00062             xt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(1)         
00063             yt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(2)
00064             zt = .5 * z_plasma * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(3)
00065             
00066         case(4) ! ellipsoid
00067             xt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) * x_plasma + plasma_centre(1)
00068             yt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) * y_plasma + plasma_centre(2)
00069             zt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) * z_plasma + plasma_centre(3)
00070 
00071         case(6, 8) ! hemisphere and hollow hemisphere
00072             xt = .5 * r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(1)
00073             yt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(2)
00074             zt = r_sphere * (2 * rano(iseed1) - 1.) + plasma_centre(3)
00075 
00076         end select geometry
00077             
00078         ! check if the new particle is in
00079         ! and if yes then add it
00080         do face_nr = 1, number_faces
00081             call face((/xt, yt, zt/), c_status, face_nr)
00082             if (c_status .ge. 0.) exit
00083         end do
00084         if (c_status .lt. 0) then
00085             p = p + 1
00086             z(p) = zt 
00087             y(p) = yt
00088             x(p) = xt
00089         end if
00090     end do
00091         
00092     ! scramble to remove correlations
00093     iseed3 = -17 - 4 * me
00094     n1 = nsphere
00095         
00096     !  exclude odd one out
00097     if (mod(nsphere,2) .ne. 0) then
00098         n1 = n1 - 1
00099     end if
00100 
00101     do i = 1, n1
00102         k = n1 * rano(iseed3) + 1
00103         xt = x(i)
00104         yt = y(i)
00105         zt = z(i)
00106         x(i) = x(k)
00107         y(i) = y(k)
00108         z(i) = z(k)
00109         x(k) = xt
00110         y(k) = yt
00111         z(k) = zt
00112     end do
00113 
00114     q(1:nep)             = qe        ! plasma electrons
00115     q(nep + 1:npp)       = qi        ! plasma ions (need Z* here)
00116     m(1:nep)             = mass_e    ! electron mass
00117     m(nep + 1:npp)       = mass_i    ! ion mass
00118     pepid(1:npp)         = me        ! processor ID
00119     pelabel(1:nep)       = me * nep + (/(i, i = 1, nep)/)      ! Electron labels
00120     pelabel(nep + 1:npp) = ne + me * nip + (/(i, i = 1, nip)/) ! Ion labels
00121 ! zero fields
00122   Ex(1:npp) = 0
00123   Ey(1:npp) = 0
00124   Ez(1:npp) = 0
00125   Bx(1:npp) = 0
00126   By(1:npp) = 0
00127   Bz(1:npp) = 0
00128   Ax(1:npp) = 0
00129   Ay(1:npp) = 0
00130   Az(1:npp) = 0
00131   Axo(1:npp) = 0
00132   Ayo(1:npp) = 0
00133   Azo(1:npp) = 0
00134   pot(1:npp) = 0
00135   work(1:npp) = 1.   ! set work load balanced initially
00136 
00137 
00138 end subroutine randion
00139
Generated on Tue Jan 23 15:57:50 2007 for PEPC by  1.4.7-20060810
